Topic.Title: Question on installing "Extending the Text Processor"(Solved)

Posts.EditableText: Tried to install this library earlier today and came back with an error about XML being invalid due to DTD being prohibited, this is the first time I have gotten this error and have installed around a half dozen libraries.
Posts.HTML: Tried to install this library earlier today and came back with an error about XML being invalid due to DTD being prohibited, this is the first time I have gotten this error and have installed around a half dozen libraries.

Posts.EditableText: NVM figured it out, was saving the file incorrectly from Github, was the first time i had done so, read the general adding a library section and found out what i had done wrong
